summary: This mod replace the sunglare texture with a tiny sunglare.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://s8.postimage.org/cvk2lfpat/tiiny_sunglare.png[/img]

* OVERVIEW *
Are you bored of overbright sunglares? Well... This mod is for you.
It replaces del sunglare.dds texture with a very tiny sunglare.
You can have a very blue sky if you have RCRN or IMAGINATOR mod too.
Just try it.

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15139-2-1334413508.jpg[/img][/center]

* INSTALLATION *
Extract the rar and put the \"textures\" folder into the data folder of your Skyrim.

* UNINSTALLATION *
Be careful. Delete only the sunglare.dds in folders \\textures\\sky

[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15139-4-1334413509.jpg[/img][/center]

* COMPATIBILITY *
This mod replace any other mod that modify the sunglare too.

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find any bug or anomaly.

[center][size=10pt]Check all my mods![/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11336][img]http://s18.postimage.org/z8rwj57jd/bridges.png[/img][/url]

[/center]
author: MannyGT
